sections.body: The following racial traits add to the base ability score modifiers chosen in the ability score modifier quality.

Prerequisites: None; Benefit: Members of this race receive a +2 racial bonus to Charisma. Special: This bonus can be taken multiple times, but each additional time it is taken, its cost increases by 1 RP. Its effects stack.
sections.name: Advanced Charisma
sections.url: pfsrd://Advanced Race Guide/Rules/Race Builder/Racial Traits/Ability Score Racial Traits/Advanced Traits/Advanced Charisma

sections.body: Prerequisites: None; Benefit: Members of this race receive a +2 racial bonus to Constitution. Special: This bonus can be taken multiple times, but each additional time it is taken, its cost increases by 1 RP. Its effects stack.
sections.name: Advanced Constitution
sections.url: pfsrd://Advanced Race Guide/Rules/Race Builder/Racial Traits/Ability Score Racial Traits/Advanced Traits/Advanced Constitution

sections.body: Prerequisites: None; Benefit: Members of this race receive a +2 racial bonus to Dexterity. Special: This bonus can be taken multiple times, but each additional time it is taken, its cost increases by 1 RP. Its effects stack.
sections.name: Advanced Dexterity
sections.url: pfsrd://Advanced Race Guide/Rules/Race Builder/Racial Traits/Ability Score Racial Traits/Advanced Traits/Advanced Dexterity

sections.body: Prerequisites: None; Benefit: Members of this race receive a +2 racial bonus to Intelligence. Special: This bonus can be taken multiple times, but each additional time it is taken, its cost increases by 1 RP. Its effects stack.
sections.name: Advanced Intelligence
sections.url: pfsrd://Advanced Race Guide/Rules/Race Builder/Racial Traits/Ability Score Racial Traits/Advanced Traits/Advanced Intelligence

sections.body: Prerequisites: None; Benefit: Members of this race receive a +2 racial bonus to Strength. Special: This bonus can be taken multiple times, but each additional time it is taken, its cost increases by 1 RP. Its effects stack.
sections.name: Advanced Strength
sections.url: pfsrd://Advanced Race Guide/Rules/Race Builder/Racial Traits/Ability Score Racial Traits/Advanced Traits/Advanced Strength

sections.body: Prerequisites: None; Benefit: Members of this race receive a +2 racial bonus to Wisdom. Special: This bonus can be taken multiple times, but each additional time it is taken, its cost increases by 1 RP. Its effects stack.
sections.name: Advanced Wisdom
sections.url: pfsrd://Advanced Race Guide/Rules/Race Builder/Racial Traits/Ability Score Racial Traits/Advanced Traits/Advanced Wisdom

sections.name: Ability Score Racial Traits

sections.body: The following racial traits augment the defenses of members of the race.

Prerequisites: None; Benefit: Choose one monster type or one subtype of the humanoid type. Members of this race gain a +2 dodge bonus to AC against monsters of that type and a +2 racial bonus on combat maneuver checks made to grapple creatures of that type.
sections.name: Ancient Foe
sections.url: pfsrd://Advanced Race Guide/Rules/Race Builder/Racial Traits/Defense Racial Traits/Standard Traits/Ancient Foe

sections.body: Prerequisites: None; Benefit: Members of this race gain a +1 bonus to CMD.
sections.name: Battle-Hardened
sections.url: pfsrd://Advanced Race Guide/Rules/Race Builder/Racial Traits/Defense Racial Traits/Standard Traits/Battle-Hardened

sections.body: Prerequisites: None; Benefit: Members of this race gain a +2 dodge bonus to AC when in a specific terrain type selected from the ranger's list of favored terrains. This choice is made at character creation, and cannot be changed.
sections.name: Bond to the Land
sections.url: pfsrd://Advanced Race Guide/Rules/Race Builder/Racial Traits/Defense Racial Traits/Standard Traits/Bond to the Land

sections.body: Prerequisite: Outsider (native) with ties to the Plane of Air or fey type; Benefit: Members of this race are surrounded by swirling winds, gaining a +2 racial bonus to AC against nonmagical ranged attacks. They can calm or renew these winds as a swift action. Once per day, a member of this race can channel this wind into a single gust, making a bull rush or trip combat maneuver attempt against one creature within 30 feet. Doing so exhausts the user's breeze-kissed ability for 24 hours. This is a supernatural ability.
sections.name: Breeze-Kissed
sections.url: pfsrd://Advanced Race Guide/Rules/Race Builder/Racial Traits/Defense Racial Traits/Standard Traits/Breeze-Kissed

sections.body: Prerequisite: The race has at least a +2 racial bonus to Dexterity; Benefit: Members of this race gain the following extraordinary ability: Once per day, when a member of this race makes a Reflex saving throw, it can roll the saving throw twice and take the better result. It must decide to use this ability before attempting the saving throw.
sections.name: Cat's Luck
sections.url: pfsrd://Advanced Race Guide/Rules/Race Builder/Racial Traits/Defense Racial Traits/Standard Traits/Cats Luck

sections.body: Prerequisite: Outsider (native) with ties to Elysium, Heaven, or Nirvana; Benefit: Members of this race gain acid resistance 5, cold resistance 5, and electricity resistance 5.
sections.name: Celestial Resistance
sections.url: pfsrd://Advanced Race Guide/Rules/Race Builder/Racial Traits/Defense Racial Traits/Standard Traits/Celestial Resistance

sections.body: Prerequisites: None; Benefit: Whenever a member of this race is reduced to half its hit points or fewer and has no conscious ally within 30 feet, it gains a +2 racial bonus on melee attack rolls and to Armor Class.
sections.name: Cornered Fury
sections.url: pfsrd://Advanced Race Guide/Rules/Race Builder/Racial Traits/Defense Racial Traits/Standard Traits/Cornered Fury

sections.body: Prerequisite: Outsider (native) with ties to the Plane of Earth, construct type, or half-construct subtype; Benefit: Members of this race have reflective, crystalline skin that grants them a +2 racial bonus to AC against rays. Once per day, they can deflect a single ray attack targeted at them as if they were using the Deflect Arrows feat.
sections.name: Crystalline Form
sections.url: pfsrd://Advanced Race Guide/Rules/Race Builder/Racial Traits/Defense Racial Traits/Standard Traits/Crystalline Form

sections.body: Prerequisites: None; Benefit: Members of this race gain resistance 5 against negative energy damage. They do not lose hit points when they gain a negative level, and they gain a +2 racial bonus on saving throws against death effects, energy drain, negative energy, and spells or spell-like abilities of the necromancy school.
sections.name: Deathless Spirit
sections.url: pfsrd://Advanced Race Guide/Rules/Race Builder/Racial Traits/Defense Racial Traits/Standard Traits/Deathless Spirit

sections.body: Prerequisites: None; Benefit: Members of this race gain a +2 dodge bonus to Armor Class.
sections.name: Defensive Training, Greater
sections.url: pfsrd://Advanced Race Guide/Rules/Race Builder/Racial Traits/Defense Racial Traits/Standard Traits/Defensive Training/Greater

sections.body: Prerequisites: None; Benefit: Choose one subtype of humanoid. Members of this race gain a +4 dodge bonus to AC against humanoids of the chosen subtype.
sections.name: Defensive Training, Lesser
sections.url: pfsrd://Advanced Race Guide/Rules/Race Builder/Racial Traits/Defense Racial Traits/Standard Traits/Defensive Training/Lesser

sections.body: Prerequisites: None; Benefit: Members of this race receive a +4 racial bonus on Constitution checks and Fortitude saves to avoid fatigue and exhaustion, as well as any other ill effects from running, forced marches, starvation, thirst, and hot or cold environments.
sections.name: Desert Runner
sections.url: pfsrd://Advanced Race Guide/Rules/Race Builder/Racial Traits/Defense Racial Traits/Standard Traits/Desert Runner

sections.body: Prerequisite: Humanoid with two subtypes or race with half-construct or half-undead subtype; Benefit: Members of this race gain a +2 bonus on all Will saving throws.
sections.name: Dual-Minded
sections.url: pfsrd://Advanced Race Guide/Rules/Race Builder/Racial Traits/Defense Racial Traits/Standard Traits/Dual-Minded

sections.body: Prerequisites: Dwarf subtype, at least a +2 racial bonus to Constitution; Benefit: Members of this race are immune to paralysis, phantasms, and poison. They also gain a +2 racial bonus on saving throws against spells and spell-like abilities.
sections.name: Duergar Immunities
sections.url: pfsrd://Advanced Race Guide/Rules/Race Builder/Racial Traits/Defense Racial Traits/Standard Traits/Duergar Immunities

sections.body: Prerequisite: Elf subtype; Benefit: Members of this race are immune to magic sleep effects and gain a +2 racial bonus on saving throws made against enchantment spells and effects.
sections.name: Elven Immunities
sections.url: pfsrd://Advanced Race Guide/Rules/Race Builder/Racial Traits/Defense Racial Traits/Standard Traits/Elven Immunities

sections.body: Prerequisite: Outsider (native) with ties to an elemental plane; Benefit: Pick one of the following energy types that corresponds to the plane the race has ties to: acid (earth), cold (water), electricity (air), or fire (fire). Members of this race have resistance 5 to the corresponding energy type. Special: This trait can be taken more than once. Each time it is taken, select an additional energy type that corresponds to another elemental plane the race has ties to.
sections.name: Energy Resistance
sections.url: pfsrd://Advanced Race Guide/Rules/Race Builder/Racial Traits/Defense Racial Traits/Standard Traits/Energy Resistance

sections.body: Prerequisites: None; Benefit: Members of this race gain a +2 racial bonus on saving throws against fear and despair effects. Also, once per day, after a natural roll of 1 on a d20 roll, members of this race may reroll and use the second result.
sections.name: Eternal Hope
sections.url: pfsrd://Advanced Race Guide/Rules/Race Builder/Racial Traits/Defense Racial Traits/Standard Traits/Eternal Hope

sections.body: Prerequisite: Outsider (native) with ties to Elysium, Heaven, or Nirvana; Benefit: Members of this race gain spell resistance equal to 6 + their character level against spells and spell-like abilities with the evil descriptor, as well as any spells and spell-like abilities cast by evil outsiders.
sections.name: Exalted Resistance
sections.url: pfsrd://Advanced Race Guide/Rules/Race Builder/Racial Traits/Defense Racial Traits/Standard Traits/Exalted Resistance

sections.body: Prerequisites: None; Benefit: Members of this race gain a +2 racial bonus on all saving throws against fear effects. Special: This bonus stacks with the bonus granted by the lucky (greater or lesser) racial trait.
sections.name: Fearless
sections.url: pfsrd://Advanced Race Guide/Rules/Race Builder/Racial Traits/Defense Racial Traits/Standard Traits/Fearless

sections.body: Prerequisite: Outsider (native) with ties to Abaddon, the Abyss, or Hell; Benefit: Members of this race gain cold resistance 5, electricity resistance 5, and fire resistance 5.
sections.name: Fiendish Resistance
sections.url: pfsrd://Advanced Race Guide/Rules/Race Builder/Racial Traits/Defense Racial Traits/Standard Traits/Fiendish Resistance

sections.body: Prerequisite: Outsider (native) with ties to the Plane of Fire or dragon type; Benefit: Members of this race gain fast healing 2 for 1 round anytime they take fire damage (whether or not this fire damage overcomes their fire resistance, if any). Members of this race can heal up to 2 hit points per level per day with this ability, after which it ceases to function.
sections.name: Fire in the Blood
sections.url: pfsrd://Advanced Race Guide/Rules/Race Builder/Racial Traits/Defense Racial Traits/Standard Traits/Fire in the Blood

sections.body: Prerequisite: Outsider (native) with ties to Elysium, Heaven, or Nirvana; Benefit: Members of this race can create light centered on their head at will as a spell-like ability. When using the halo, a member of this race gains a +2 circumstance bonus on Intimidate checks against evil creatures and on saving throws against becoming blinded or dazzled.
sections.name: Halo
sections.url: pfsrd://Advanced Race Guide/Rules/Race Builder/Racial Traits/Defense Racial Traits/Standard Traits/Halo

sections.body: Prerequisite: The race has at least a +2 racial bonus to Constitution; Benefit: Members of this race gain a +2 racial bonus on saving throws against poison, spells, and spell-like abilities.
sections.name: Hardy
sections.url: pfsrd://Advanced Race Guide/Rules/Race Builder/Racial Traits/Defense Racial Traits/Standard Traits/Hardy

sections.body: Prerequisite: The race has at least a +2 racial bonus to Constitution; Benefit: Members of this race gain a +4 bonus on Fortitude saves against disease and poison, including magical diseases.
sections.name: Healthy
sections.url: pfsrd://Advanced Race Guide/Rules/Race Builder/Racial Traits/Defense Racial Traits/Standard Traits/Healthy

sections.body: Prerequisite: Outsider (native) with ties to the Plane of Water, fey type, or plant type; Benefit: Members of this race gain fast healing 2 for 1 round anytime they submerge completely within a body of natural salt water, fresh water, or brackish water. Stagnant, poisoned, or trapped water (such as water within an artificial pit or a bag of holding) does not activate this ability. Members of this race can heal up to 2 hit points per level per day with this ability, after which it ceases to function.
sections.name: Hydrated Vitality
sections.url: pfsrd://Advanced Race Guide/Rules/Race Builder/Racial Traits/Defense Racial Traits/Standard Traits/Hydrated Vitality

sections.body: Prerequisites: None; Benefit: Members of this race gain a +2 racial bonus on saving throws against illusion spells or effects.
sections.name: Illusion Resistance
sections.url: pfsrd://Advanced Race Guide/Rules/Race Builder/Racial Traits/Defense Racial Traits/Standard Traits/Illusion Resistance

sections.body: Prerequisite: A Constitution score; Benefit: Members of this race gain a +2 racial bonus on all saving throws made to resist death effects, saving throws against negative energy effects, Fortitude saves made to remove negative levels, and Constitution checks made to stabilize if reduced to negative hit points.
sections.name: Lifebound
sections.url: pfsrd://Advanced Race Guide/Rules/Race Builder/Racial Traits/Defense Racial Traits/Standard Traits/Lifebound

sections.body: Prerequisites: None; Benefit: Members of this race gain a +1 racial bonus on all saving throws.
sections.name: Lucky, Lesser
sections.url: pfsrd://Advanced Race Guide/Rules/Race Builder/Racial Traits/Defense Racial Traits/Standard Traits/Lucky/Lesser

sections.body: Prerequisites: None; Benefit: Whenever a member of this race has concealment or total concealment, the miss chance of attacks against her increases by 5%.
sections.name: Mist Child
sections.url: pfsrd://Advanced Race Guide/Rules/Race Builder/Racial Traits/Defense Racial Traits/Standard Traits/Mist Child

sections.body: Prerequisites: None; Benefit: Members of this race gain a +2 racial bonus on Acrobatics checks made to cross narrow ledges and on saving throws against altitude fatigue and sickness.
sections.name: Mountain-Born
sections.url: pfsrd://Advanced Race Guide/Rules/Race Builder/Racial Traits/Defense Racial Traits/Standard Traits/Mountain-Born

sections.body: Prerequisites: None; Benefit: Members of this race gain a +1 natural armor bonus to their Armor Class.
sections.name: Natural Armor
sections.url: pfsrd://Advanced Race Guide/Rules/Race Builder/Racial Traits/Defense Racial Traits/Standard Traits/Natural Armor

sections.body: Prerequisites: None; Benefit: Members of this race gain a +2 racial bonus on saving throws against disease, ingested poisons, and becoming nauseated or sickened.
sections.name: Plagueborn
sections.url: pfsrd://Advanced Race Guide/Rules/Race Builder/Racial Traits/Defense Racial Traits/Standard Traits/Plagueborn

sections.body: Prerequisites: None; Benefit: Members of this race gain a racial bonus on saving throws against poison effects equal to their Hit Dice.
sections.name: Poison Resistance
sections.url: pfsrd://Advanced Race Guide/Rules/Race Builder/Racial Traits/Defense Racial Traits/Standard Traits/Poison Resistance

sections.body: Prerequisite: Negative energy affinity racial trait; Benefit: Members of this race take no penalty from energy-draining effects, though a member of this race can still be killed if it accrues more negative levels than it has Hit Dice. After 24 hours, any negative levels a member of this race has accrued are removed without the need for any additional saving throws.
sections.name: Resist Level Drain
sections.url: pfsrd://Advanced Race Guide/Rules/Race Builder/Racial Traits/Defense Racial Traits/Standard Traits/Resist Level Drain

sections.body: Prerequisites: None; Benefit: Members of this race gain a +2 racial bonus on saving throws against mind-affecting effects and poison.
sections.name: Resistant
sections.url: pfsrd://Advanced Race Guide/Rules/Race Builder/Racial Traits/Defense Racial Traits/Standard Traits/Resistant

sections.body: Prerequisite: Shadow resistance racial trait; Benefit: Attacks made against members of this race while they are within areas of dim light have a 50% miss chance instead of the normal 20% miss chance. This trait does not grant total concealment; it just increases the miss chance. This is a supernatural ability.
sections.name: Shadow Blending
sections.url: pfsrd://Advanced Race Guide/Rules/Race Builder/Racial Traits/Defense Racial Traits/Standard Traits/Shadow Blending

sections.body: Prerequisites: None; Benefit: Members of this race gain cold resistance 5 and electricity resistance 5.
sections.name: Shadow Resistance
sections.url: pfsrd://Advanced Race Guide/Rules/Race Builder/Racial Traits/Defense Racial Traits/Standard Traits/Shadow Resistance

sections.body: Prerequisites: None; Benefit: Members of this race gain spell resistance equal to 11 + their character level.
sections.name: Spell Resistance, Greater
sections.url: pfsrd://Advanced Race Guide/Rules/Race Builder/Racial Traits/Defense Racial Traits/Standard Traits/Spell Resistance/Greater

sections.body: Prerequisites: None; Benefit: Members of this race gain spell resistance equal to 6 + their character level.
sections.name: Spell Resistance, Lesser
sections.url: pfsrd://Advanced Race Guide/Rules/Race Builder/Racial Traits/Defense Racial Traits/Standard Traits/Spell Resistance/Lesser

sections.body: Prerequisites: None; Benefit: Members of this race receive a +4 racial bonus to their CMD when resisting bull rush or trip attempts while standing on the ground.
sections.name: Stability
sections.url: pfsrd://Advanced Race Guide/Rules/Race Builder/Racial Traits/Defense Racial Traits/Standard Traits/Stability

sections.body: Prerequisite: Outsider (native) with ties to the Plane of Earth, construct type, dragon type, or half-construct subtype; Benefit: Members of this race gaining fast healing 2 for 1 round anytime they take acid damage (whether or not this acid damage overcomes their acid resistance, if any). A member of this race can heal up to 2 hit points per level per day with this ability, after which it ceases to function.
sections.name: Stone in the Blood
sections.url: pfsrd://Advanced Race Guide/Rules/Race Builder/Racial Traits/Defense Racial Traits/Standard Traits/Stone in the Blood

sections.body: Prerequisite: Outsider (native) with ties to the Plane of Air, dragon type, fey type, or plant type; Benefit: Members of this race gain fast healing 2 for 1 round anytime they take electricity damage (whether or not this electricity damage overcomes their electricity resistance, if any). A member of this race can heal up to 2 hit points per level per day with this ability, after which it ceases to function.
sections.name: Storm in the Blood
sections.url: pfsrd://Advanced Race Guide/Rules/Race Builder/Racial Traits/Defense Racial Traits/Standard Traits/Storm in the Blood

sections.body: Prerequisites: None; Benefit: Members of this race gain a +2 racial bonus on Will saving throws to resist spells and spell-like abilities of the enchantment (charm) and enchantment (compulsion) subschools. In addition, if a member of this race fails such a save, it receives another save 1 round later to prematurely end the effect (assuming the spell or spell-like ability has a duration greater than 1 round). This second save is made at the same DC as the first. If the member of the race has a similar ability from another source (such as a rogue's slippery mind class feature), it can only use one of these abilities per round, but can try the other on the second round if the first reroll ability fails.
sections.name: Stubborn
sections.url: pfsrd://Advanced Race Guide/Rules/Race Builder/Racial Traits/Defense Racial Traits/Standard Traits/Stubborn

sections.body: Prerequisites: None; Benefit: Members of this race gain a +2 racial bonus on saving throws against disease and mind-affecting effects.
sections.name: Undead Resistance
sections.url: pfsrd://Advanced Race Guide/Rules/Race Builder/Racial Traits/Defense Racial Traits/Standard Traits/Undead Resistance

sections.body: Prerequisites: None; Benefit: Members of this race unnerve normal animals, and train to defend themselves against the inevitable attacks from such creatures. Members of this race take a –4 penalty on all Charisma-based skill checks to affect creatures of the animal type, and receive a +4 dodge bonus to AC against animals. Animals' starting attitude toward members of this race is one step worse than normal.
sections.name: Unnatural
sections.url: pfsrd://Advanced Race Guide/Rules/Race Builder/Racial Traits/Defense Racial Traits/Standard Traits/Unnatural

sections.body: Prerequisite: Fey type; Benefit: Members of this race gain DR 5/cold iron.
sections.name: Fey Damage Resistance
sections.url: pfsrd://Advanced Race Guide/Rules/Race Builder/Racial Traits/Defense Racial Traits/Advanced Traits/Fey Damage Resistance

sections.body: Prerequisite: Natural armor racial trait; Benefit: Members of this race gain a +1 natural armor bonus. Special: This racial trait can be taken multiple times. Each additional time you take this trait, increase its cost by 1 RP. Its effects stack.
sections.name: Improved Natural Armor
sections.url: pfsrd://Advanced Race Guide/Rules/Race Builder/Racial Traits/Defense Racial Traits/Advanced Traits/Improved Natural Armor

sections.body: Prerequisite: Resistance 5 to any energy type; Benefit: Members of this race increase their resistance to one energy type to 10. Special: This racial trait can be taken multiple times. Each additional time you take this trait, increase its cost by 1 RP, and increase one other resistance to 10.
sections.name: Improved Resistance
sections.url: pfsrd://Advanced Race Guide/Rules/Race Builder/Racial Traits/Defense Racial Traits/Advanced Traits/Improved Resistance

sections.body: Prerequisites: None; Benefit: Members of this race gain a +2 racial bonus on all saving throws.
sections.name: Lucky, Greater
sections.url: pfsrd://Advanced Race Guide/Rules/Race Builder/Racial Traits/Defense Racial Traits/Advanced Traits/Lucky/Greater

sections.body: Prerequisites: None; Benefit: Members of this race gain DR 5/silver.
sections.name: Moon-Touched Damage Resistance
sections.url: pfsrd://Advanced Race Guide/Rules/Race Builder/Racial Traits/Defense Racial Traits/Advanced Traits/Moon-Touched Damage Resistance

sections.body: Prerequisite: Undead type; Benefit: Members of this race gain DR 5/bludgeoning.
sections.name: Skeletal Damage Reduction
sections.url: pfsrd://Advanced Race Guide/Rules/Race Builder/Racial Traits/Defense Racial Traits/Advanced Traits/Skeletal Damage Reduction

sections.body: Prerequisites: None; Benefit: Members of this race gain DR 5/magic. Special: This can be increased to DR 10/magic for an additional 2 RP. The type of DR can be changed to one of the alignments (chaos, evil, good, or law) if the race is of the outsider (native) type with ties to the appropriate plane (chaos for a race with ties to a lawful-aligned plane, evil for a race with ties to a good-aligned plane, etc.) for an additional 2 RP.
sections.name: Damage Reduction
sections.url: pfsrd://Advanced Race Guide/Rules/Race Builder/Racial Traits/Defense Racial Traits/Monstrous Traits/Damage Reduction

sections.body: Prerequisite: Outsider (native) with ties to an elemental plane; Benefit: Pick one of the following energy types that corresponds to the plane the race has ties to: acid (earth), cold (water), electricity (air), or fire (fire). Members of this race are immune to the chosen energy type. Special: This trait can be taken more than once. Each additional time you take this trait, increase its cost by 1 RP. Each time it is taken, select another energy type that corresponds to another elemental plane the race has ties to. If a race has vulnerability to fire and immunity to cold, it gains the cold subtype. If a race has vulnerability to cold and immunity to fire, it gains the fire subtype.
sections.name: Elemental Immunity
sections.url: pfsrd://Advanced Race Guide/Rules/Race Builder/Racial Traits/Defense Racial Traits/Monstrous Traits/Elemental Immunity

sections.body: Prerequisites: None; Benefit: Members of this race regain 1 hit point each round. Except for where noted here, fast healing is just like natural healing. Fast healing does not restore hit points lost from starvation, thirst, or suffocation, nor does it allow a creature to regrow lost body parts. Fast healing continues to function (even at negative hit points) until a member of this race dies, at which point the effects of fast healing immediately end. Special: This trait can be taken multiple times. Each time fast healing is taken, its cost increases by 1 RP.
sections.name: Fast Healing
sections.url: pfsrd://Advanced Race Guide/Rules/Race Builder/Racial Traits/Defense Racial Traits/Monstrous Traits/Fast Healing

sections.body: Prerequisite: Large size quality; Benefit: Members of this race can catch Small, Medium, or Large rocks (or projectiles of similar shape). Once per round, a member of this race that would normally be hit by a rock can make a Reflex saving throw to catch it as a free action. The DC is 15 for a Small rock, 20 for a Medium rock, and 25 for a Large rock (if the projectile provides a magical bonus on attack rolls, the DC increases by that amount). The member of this race must be aware of the attack in order to make a rock catching attempt.
sections.name: Rock Catching
sections.url: pfsrd://Advanced Race Guide/Rules/Race Builder/Racial Traits/Defense Racial Traits/Monstrous Traits/Rock Catching

sections.name: Defense Racial Traits

sections.body: Feat and skill racial traits typically grant bonuses on particular skills or grant bonus feats.
Prerequisites: None; Benefit: Members of this race gain a +4 racial bonus on Bluff checks to convince an opponent that what they are saying is true when they tell a lie.
sections.name: Beguiling Liar
sections.url: pfsrd://Advanced Race Guide/Rules/Race Builder/Racial Traits/Feat and Skill Racial Traits/Standard Traits/Beguiling Liar

sections.body: Prerequisites: None; Benefit: Choose a ranger favored terrain type. Members of this race gain a +4 racial bonus on Stealth checks while within that terrain type.
sections.name: Camouflage
sections.url: pfsrd://Advanced Race Guide/Rules/Race Builder/Racial Traits/Feat and Skill Racial Traits/Standard Traits/Camouflage

sections.body: Prerequisites: None; Benefit: Members of this race gain a +1 bonus on Knowledge (dungeoneering) and Survival checks made underground.
sections.name: Cave Dweller
sections.url: pfsrd://Advanced Race Guide/Rules/Race Builder/Racial Traits/Feat and Skill Racial Traits/Standard Traits/Cave Dweller

sections.body: Prerequisites: None; Benefit: Member of this race gain a +2 racial bonus on all Craft or Profession checks to create objects from metal or stone.
sections.name: Craftsman
sections.url: pfsrd://Advanced Race Guide/Rules/Race Builder/Racial Traits/Feat and Skill Racial Traits/Standard Traits/Craftsman

sections.body: Prerequisites: None; Benefit: Members of this race are naturally inquisitive about the world around them. They gain a +4 bonus on Diplomacy checks to gather information, and Knowledge (history) and Knowledge (local) become class skills for them. If they choose a class that has either of these Knowledge skills as class skills, they gain a +2 racial bonus on those skills instead.
sections.name: Curiosity
sections.url: pfsrd://Advanced Race Guide/Rules/Race Builder/Racial Traits/Feat and Skill Racial Traits/Standard Traits/Curiosity

sections.body: Prerequisites: None; Benefit: Once per day, members of this race can roll twice when making a Bluff or Diplomacy check and take the better roll.
sections.name: Emissary
sections.url: pfsrd://Advanced Race Guide/Rules/Race Builder/Racial Traits/Feat and Skill Racial Traits/Standard Traits/Emissary

sections.body: Prerequisites: None; Benefit: Members of this race select one extra feat at 1st level.
sections.name: Flexible Bonus Feat
sections.url: pfsrd://Advanced Race Guide/Rules/Race Builder/Racial Traits/Feat and Skill Racial Traits/Standard Traits/Flexible Bonus Feat

sections.body: Prerequisites: None; Benefit: At 1st, 8th, and 16th level, members of this race gain Skill Focus in a skill of their choice as a bonus feat.
sections.name: Focused Study
sections.url: pfsrd://Advanced Race Guide/Rules/Race Builder/Racial Traits/Feat and Skill Racial Traits/Standard Traits/Focused Study

sections.body: Prerequisite: Standard or linguist language quality; Benefit: Members of this race gain a +1 racial bonus on Bluff and Diplomacy checks, and they learn one additional language every time they put a rank in the Linguistics skill.
sections.name: Gift of Tongues
sections.url: pfsrd://Advanced Race Guide/Rules/Race Builder/Racial Traits/Feat and Skill Racial Traits/Standard Traits/Gift of Tongues

sections.body: Prerequisite: Standard or linguist language quality; Benefit: Members of this race gain a +4 racial bonus on Linguistics checks, and they learn one additional language every time they put a rank in the Linguistics skill.
sections.name: Gifted Linguist
sections.url: pfsrd://Advanced Race Guide/Rules/Race Builder/Racial Traits/Feat and Skill Racial Traits/Standard Traits/Gifted Linguist

sections.body: Prerequisites: None; Benefit: Members of this race gain a +2 bonus on Appraise checks to determine the price of nonmagical goods that contain precious metals or gemstones.
sections.name: Greed
sections.url: pfsrd://Advanced Race Guide/Rules/Race Builder/Racial Traits/Feat and Skill Racial Traits/Standard Traits/Greed

sections.body: Prerequisite: The race has at least a +2 racial bonus to Charisma; Benefit: When members of this race successfully use Diplomacy to win over an individual, that creature takes a –2 penalty on attempts to resist any of the member's Charisma-based skills for the next 24 hours.
sections.name: Gregarious
sections.url: pfsrd://Advanced Race Guide/Rules/Race Builder/Racial Traits/Feat and Skill Racial Traits/Standard Traits/Gregarious

sections.body: Prerequisites: None; Benefit: Members of this race gain a +1 bonus on Bluff, Disguise, and Knowledge (local) checks.
sections.name: Integrated
sections.url: pfsrd://Advanced Race Guide/Rules/Race Builder/Racial Traits/Feat and Skill Racial Traits/Standard Traits/Integrated

sections.body: Prerequisites: None; Benefit: Members of this race gain a +1 bonus on Disable Device and Knowledge (engineering) checks. Members of this race are also treated as proficient with any weapon they have personally crafted.
sections.name: Master Tinker
sections.url: pfsrd://Advanced Race Guide/Rules/Race Builder/Racial Traits/Feat and Skill Racial Traits/Standard Traits/Master Tinker

sections.body: Prerequisite: The race has at least a +2 racial bonus to Dexterity; Benefit: Members of this race land on their feet even when they take lethal damage from a fall. Furthermore, they gain a +1 bonus to their CMD against trip attempts.
sections.name: Nimble Faller
sections.url: pfsrd://Advanced Race Guide/Rules/Race Builder/Racial Traits/Feat and Skill Racial Traits/Standard Traits/Nimble Faller

sections.body: Prerequisites: None; Benefit: Members of this race gain a +2 racial bonus on Appraise and Perception checks to find hidden objects (including traps and secret doors), determine whether food is spoiled, or identify a potion by taste.
sections.name: Scavenger
sections.url: pfsrd://Advanced Race Guide/Rules/Race Builder/Racial Traits/Feat and Skill Racial Traits/Standard Traits/Scavenger

sections.body: Prerequisites: None; Benefit: Members of this race have past lives that grant them two particular Knowledge skills. Each member of this race picks two Knowledge skills. The member of this race gains a +2 racial bonus on both of these skills, and those skills are treated as class skills regardless of what class the member of this race actually takes.
sections.name: Shards of the Past
sections.url: pfsrd://Advanced Race Guide/Rules/Race Builder/Racial Traits/Feat and Skill Racial Traits/Standard Traits/Shards of the Past

sections.body: Prerequisites: None; Benefit: Members of this race reduce the penalty for using Stealth while moving by 5 and can make Stealth checks while running at a –20 penalty (this number includes the penalty reduction from this trait).
sections.name: Silent Hunter
sections.url: pfsrd://Advanced Race Guide/Rules/Race Builder/Racial Traits/Feat and Skill Racial Traits/Standard Traits/Silent Hunter

sections.body: Prerequisites: None; Benefit: Members of this race gain a +2 bonus on Diplomacy and Bluff checks. In addition, when they use Diplomacy to shift a creature's attitude, they can do so up to three steps up rather than just two.
sections.name: Silver Tongued
sections.url: pfsrd://Advanced Race Guide/Rules/Race Builder/Racial Traits/Feat and Skill Racial Traits/Standard Traits/Silver Tongued

sections.body: Prerequisites: None; Benefits: Pick a single skill. Members of this race gain a +2 racial bonus on skill checks made with this skill. Alternatively, pick two related skills—each member of this race gains a +1 racial bonus on these skills during character creation. Special: This trait can be taken up to three times. Each time it is taken, choose a different skill (+2 bonus) or two different skills (+1 bonus on one of character's choice).
sections.name: Skill Bonus
sections.url: pfsrd://Advanced Race Guide/Rules/Race Builder/Racial Traits/Feat and Skill Racial Traits/Standard Traits/Skill Bonus

sections.body: Prerequisites: None; Benefit: Pick up to two skills. These skills are always considered class skills for members of this race.
sections.name: Skill Training
sections.url: pfsrd://Advanced Race Guide/Rules/Race Builder/Racial Traits/Feat and Skill Racial Traits/Standard Traits/Skill Training

sections.body: Prerequisites: None; Benefit: Members of this race gain an additional skill rank at 1st level and one additional skill rank whenever they gain a level.
sections.name: Skilled

sections.body: Prerequisites: None; Benefit: Members of this race gain a +4 racial bonus on Stealth checks.
sections.name: Sneaky
sections.url: pfsrd://Advanced Race Guide/Rules/Race Builder/Racial Traits/Feat and Skill Racial Traits/Standard Traits/Sneaky

sections.body: Prerequisites: None; Benefit: Members of this race gain a +4 racial bonus on Ride and Stealth checks.
sections.name: Sneaky Rider
sections.url: pfsrd://Advanced Race Guide/Rules/Race Builder/Racial Traits/Feat and Skill Racial Traits/Standard Traits/Sneaky Rider

sections.body: Prerequisites: None; Benefit: When members of this race attempt to change a creature's attitude with a Diplomacy check and fail by 5 or more, they can try to influence the creature a second time even if 24 hours have not passed.
sections.name: Sociable
sections.url: pfsrd://Advanced Race Guide/Rules/Race Builder/Racial Traits/Feat and Skill Racial Traits/Standard Traits/Sociable

sections.body: Prerequisites: None; Benefit: Perception and Stealth are always class skills for members of this race.
sections.name: Stalker
sections.url: pfsrd://Advanced Race Guide/Rules/Race Builder/Racial Traits/Feat and Skill Racial Traits/Standard Traits/Stalker

sections.body: Prerequisites: None; Benefit: Choose one feat with no prerequisites. All members of this race gain this feat as a bonus feat at 1st level.
sections.name: Static Bonus Feat
sections.url: pfsrd://Advanced Race Guide/Rules/Race Builder/Racial Traits/Feat and Skill Racial Traits/Standard Traits/Static Bonus Feat

sections.body: Prerequisites: None; Benefit: Members of this race receive a +2 bonus on Perception checks to notice unusual stonework, such as traps and hidden doors located in stone walls or floors. They receive a check to notice such features whenever they pass within 10 feet of them, whether or not they are actively looking.
sections.name: Stonecunning
sections.url: pfsrd://Advanced Race Guide/Rules/Race Builder/Racial Traits/Feat and Skill Racial Traits/Standard Traits/Stonecunning

sections.body: Prerequisite: Race is native to the Darklands; Benefit: Members of this race gain a +2 racial bonus on Craft (alchemy), Perception, and Stealth checks. The bonus on Stealth checks increases to a +4 bonus while underground.
sections.name: Underground Sneak
sections.url: pfsrd://Advanced Race Guide/Rules/Race Builder/Racial Traits/Feat and Skill Racial Traits/Standard Traits/Underground Sneak

sections.body: Prerequisites: None; Benefit: Members of this race gain a +2 racial bonus on Diplomacy checks made to gather information and Sense Motive checks made to get a hunch about a social situation.
sections.name: Urbanite
sections.url: pfsrd://Advanced Race Guide/Rules/Race Builder/Racial Traits/Feat and Skill Racial Traits/Standard Traits/Urbanite

sections.body: Prerequisites: None; Benefit: Members of this race gain a +4 racial bonus on Swim checks, can always take 10 while swimming, and may choose Aquan as a bonus language.
sections.name: Water Child
sections.url: pfsrd://Advanced Race Guide/Rules/Race Builder/Racial Traits/Feat and Skill Racial Traits/Standard Traits/Water Child

sections.body: Prerequisites: None; Benefit: Members of this race receive Weapon Finesse as a bonus feat.
sections.name: Nimble Attacks
sections.url: pfsrd://Advanced Race Guide/Rules/Race Builder/Racial Traits/Feat and Skill Racial Traits/Advanced Traits/Nimble Attacks

sections.body: Prerequisites: None; Benefit: Members of this race receive Improved Initiative as a bonus feat.
sections.name: Quick Reactions
sections.url: pfsrd://Advanced Race Guide/Rules/Race Builder/Racial Traits/Feat and Skill Racial Traits/Advanced Traits/Quick Reactions

sections.name: Feat and Skill Racial Traits

sections.body: The following racial traits augment a race's ability to use magic or grant spell-like abilities.
Prerequisites: None; Benefit: Members of this race gain a +2 racial bonus on concentration checks made to cast arcane spells defensively.
sections.name: Arcane Focus
sections.url: pfsrd://Advanced Race Guide/Rules/Race Builder/Racial Traits/Magical Racial Traits/Standard Traits/Arcane Focus

sections.body: Prerequisite: Aberration, dragon, fey, humanoid, or monstrous humanoid type; Benefit: Members of this race gain the following supernatural ability: a member of this race can assume the appearance of a Small or Medium humanoid as the alter self spell, save that it does not adjust its ability scores.
sections.name: Change Shape, Greater
sections.url: pfsrd://Advanced Race Guide/Rules/Race Builder/Racial Traits/Magical Racial Traits/Standard Traits/Change Shape/Greater

sections.body: Prerequisite: Aberration, dragon, fey, humanoid, or monstrous humanoid type; Benefit: Members of this race gain the following supernatural ability: A member of this race can assume the appearance of a single form of a single humanoid race of its size. The form is static and cannot be changed each time it takes this form. The creature gains a +10 racial bonus on Disguise checks made to appear as the member of the race whose appearance it assumes. Changing its shape is a standard action. This trait otherwise functions as alter self, save that the creature does not adjust its ability scores.
sections.name: Change Shape, Lesser
sections.url: pfsrd://Advanced Race Guide/Rules/Race Builder/Racial Traits/Magical Racial Traits/Standard Traits/Change Shape/Lesser

sections.body: Prerequisite: Native of the Darklands; Benefit: Members of this race gain a +2 racial bonus on caster level checks made to overcome spell resistance and a +2 racial bonus on dispel checks.
sections.name: Deep Magic
sections.url: pfsrd://Advanced Race Guide/Rules/Race Builder/Racial Traits/Magical Racial Traits/Standard Traits/Deep Magic

sections.body: Prerequisite: Outsider (native) with ties to the Shadow Plane, fey type, undead type, or half-undead subtype; Benefit: Members of this race gain the following supernatural ability: Once per day, a member of this race can change its appearance to look as if it were little more than a 4-foot-tall area of shadow. Its physical form still exists and it is not incorporeal—only its appearance changes. This racial trait works like invisibility, except the effect only lasts 1 round per level (maximum 5 rounds).
sections.name: Dissolution's Child
sections.url: pfsrd://Advanced Race Guide/Rules/Race Builder/Racial Traits/Magical Racial Traits/Standard Traits/Dissolutions Child

sections.body: Prerequisites: None; Benefit: Members of this race gain a +1 bonus to the saving throw DCs of spells of the divination school and spells that produce sleep effects that they cast. In addition, members of this race with a Charisma score of 15 or higher may use dream once per day as a spell-like ability (caster level is equal to the user's character level).
sections.name: Dreamspeaker
sections.url: pfsrd://Advanced Race Guide/Rules/Race Builder/Racial Traits/Magical Racial Traits/Standard Traits/Dreamspeaker

sections.body: Prerequisite: Outsider (native) with ties to an elemental plane; Benefit: If a member of the race is a sorcerer with the elemental bloodline corresponding to the elemental plane it has ties to (i.e., air, earth, fire, or water), it treats its Charisma score as 2 points higher for all sorcerer spells and class abilities. Furthermore, a member of this race able to cast domain spells that correspond to the elemental plane the race has ties to casts its domain powers and spells at +1 caster level. This trait does not give members of this race early access to level-based powers; it only affects powers that they could already use without this trait.
sections.name: Elemental Affinity
sections.url: pfsrd://Advanced Race Guide/Rules/Race Builder/Racial Traits/Magical Racial Traits/Standard Traits/Elemental Affinity

sections.body: Prerequisites: None; Benefit: Choose one of the following elemental subtypes—air, earth, fire, or water. When summoning a creature with the chosen subtype with a summon spell, increase the duration of that spell by 2 rounds.
sections.name: Elemental Summoner
sections.url: pfsrd://Advanced Race Guide/Rules/Race Builder/Racial Traits/Magical Racial Traits/Standard Traits/Elemental Summoner

sections.body: Prerequisite: Elf subtype; Benefit: Members of this race gain a +2 bonus on caster level checks made to overcome spell resistance. In addition, they also receive a +2 racial bonus on Spellcraft checks made to identify the properties of magic items.
sections.name: Elven Magic
sections.url: pfsrd://Advanced Race Guide/Rules/Race Builder/Racial Traits/Magical Racial Traits/Standard Traits/Elven Magic

sections.body: Prerequisites: None; Benefit: Members of this race add +1 to the caster level of any abjuration spells they cast. Members of this race also gain the following spell-like abilities: constant—nondetection; 1/day—faerie fire, obscure object, sanctuary. The caster level for these effects is equal to the user's character level.
sections.name: Enclave Protector
sections.url: pfsrd://Advanced Race Guide/Rules/Race Builder/Racial Traits/Magical Racial Traits/Standard Traits/Enclave Protector

sections.body: Prerequisites: None; Benefit: Members of this race with an Intelligence score of 11 or higher gain the following spell-like abilities: 1/day—comprehend languages, detect magic, detect poison, read magic. The caster level for these effects is equal to the user's character level.
sections.name: Envoy
sections.url: pfsrd://Advanced Race Guide/Rules/Race Builder/Racial Traits/Magical Racial Traits/Standard Traits/Envoy

sections.body: Prerequisites: None; Benefit: Members of this race gain +1 to the DC of any saving throws against necromancy spells that they cast. Members of this race with a Wisdom score of 11 or higher also gain the following spell-like abilities: 1/day—bleed, chill touch, detect poison, touch of fatigue. The caster level for these effects is equal to the user's character level. The DC for these spell-like abilities is equal to 10 + the spell's level + the user's Wisdom modifier.
sections.name: Fell Magic
sections.url: pfsrd://Advanced Race Guide/Rules/Race Builder/Racial Traits/Magical Racial Traits/Standard Traits/Fell Magic

sections.body: Prerequisite: Outsider (native) with ties to the Plane of Earth; Benefit: Once per day, a member of this race can cause a touched piece of iron or steel to grow into an object weighing up to 10 pounds, such as a sword, crowbar, or light steel shield. This object remains in this form for 10 minutes or until broken or destroyed, at which point it shrinks back to its original size and shape.
sections.name: Ferrous Growth
sections.url: pfsrd://Advanced Race Guide/Rules/Race Builder/Racial Traits/Magical Racial Traits/Standard Traits/Ferrous Growth

sections.body: Prerequisite: Outsider (native) with ties to the Plane of Earth, fey type, or plant type; Benefit: Sorcerer members of this race with the verdant bloodline treat their Charisma score as 2 points higher for all sorcerer spells and class abilities. Clerics who are members of this race with the Plant domain use their domain powers and spells at +1 caster level. This trait does not give members of this race early access to level-based powers; it only affects powers that they could already use without this trait.
sections.name: Fertile Soil
sections.url: pfsrd://Advanced Race Guide/Rules/Race Builder/Racial Traits/Magical Racial Traits/Standard Traits/Fertile Soil

sections.body: Prerequisite: Outsider (native) with ties to Abaddon, the Abyss, or Hell; Benefit: If a member of this race is a sorcerer with the Abyssal or Infernal bloodline, it treats its caster level as 1 higher when casting bonus spells and bloodline powers. This trait does not give members of this race early access to level-based powers; it only affects powers that they could already use without this trait.
sections.name: Fiendish Sorcery
sections.url: pfsrd://Advanced Race Guide/Rules/Race Builder/Racial Traits/Magical Racial Traits/Standard Traits/Fiendish Sorcery

sections.body: Prerequisite: Gnome subtype; Benefit: Members of this race gain a +1 bonus to the DC of any saving throws against illusion spells that they cast. Members of this race with a Charisma score of 11 or higher also gain the following spell-like abilities: 1/day—dancing lights, ghost sounds, prestidigitation, speak with animals. The caster level for these effects is equal to the user's level. The DC for the spell-like abilities is equal to 10 + the spell's level + the user's Charisma modifier.
sections.name: Gnome Magic
sections.url: pfsrd://Advanced Race Guide/Rules/Race Builder/Racial Traits/Magical Racial Traits/Standard Traits/Gnome Magic

sections.body: Prerequisite: Outsider (native) with ties to Elysium, Heaven, or Nirvana; Benefit: Members of this race gain a +2 bonus on Knowledge (planes) checks, and they cast spells with the good or light descriptor at +1 caster level.
sections.name: Heavenborn
sections.url: pfsrd://Advanced Race Guide/Rules/Race Builder/Racial Traits/Magical Racial Traits/Standard Traits/Heavenborn

sections.body: Prerequisites: None; Benefit: Members of this race add +1 to the DC for all saving throws against spells or effects they cast that inflict the fascinated condition. Once per day, when a creature rolls a saving throw against such an effect from a member of this race, the member of the race can force that creature to reroll the saving throw and use the second result, even if it is worse.
sections.name: Hypnotic
sections.url: pfsrd://Advanced Race Guide/Rules/Race Builder/Racial Traits/Magical Racial Traits/Standard Traits/Hypnotic

sections.body: Prerequisites: None; Benefit: Members of this race gain the following supernatural ability: Once per day, a member of this race can attempt to hypnotize a single target as per the spell hypnotism (caster level equal to its character level). The effects of the hypnotic gaze last only 1 round.
sections.name: Hypnotic Gaze
sections.url: pfsrd://Advanced Race Guide/Rules/Race Builder/Racial Traits/Magical Racial Traits/Standard Traits/Hypnotic Gaze

sections.body: Prerequisite: Outsider (native) with ties to Elysium, Heaven, or Nirvana; Benefit: Members of this race gain a +2 bonus on Knowledge (history) checks and saving throws against death effects and can use lesser age resistance once per day as a spell-like ability.
sections.name: Immortal Spark
sections.url: pfsrd://Advanced Race Guide/Rules/Race Builder/Racial Traits/Magical Racial Traits/Standard Traits/Immortal Spark

sections.body: Prerequisites: None; Benefit: Members of this race are immune to light-based blindness and dazzle effects, and are treated as one level higher when determining the effects of any light-based spells or effects they cast (including spell-like and supernatural abilities). If a member of this race has an Intelligence of 10 or higher, it may use light at will as a spell-like ability.
sections.name: Lightbringer
sections.url: pfsrd://Advanced Race Guide/Rules/Race Builder/Racial Traits/Magical Racial Traits/Standard Traits/Lightbringer

sections.body: Prerequisites: None; Benefit: Members of this race gain a +1 bonus to the DC of spells they cast that have the language-dependent descriptor or that create glyphs, symbols, or other magical writings. They also gain a +2 racial bonus on saving throws against such spells. Members of this race with a Charisma score of 11 or higher also gain the following spell-like abilities: 1/day—arcane mark, comprehend languages, message, read magic. The caster level for these spell-like abilities is equal to the user's character level.
sections.name: Magical Linguist
sections.url: pfsrd://Advanced Race Guide/Rules/Race Builder/Racial Traits/Magical Racial Traits/Standard Traits/Magical Linguist

sections.body: Prerequisite: Outsider (native) with ties to the Plane of Water or fey type; Benefit: Members of this race gain the following supernatural ability: Once per day, a member of this race can create a 20-foot-radius burst that causes humanoids within the aura's range to become fascinated with the user (as the bard's fascinate bardic performance). Affected humanoids may resist this effect by making a successful Will saving throw (DC 10 + 1/2 the user's character level + the user's Charisma modifier).
sections.name: Nereid Fascination
sections.url: pfsrd://Advanced Race Guide/Rules/Race Builder/Racial Traits/Magical Racial Traits/Standard Traits/Nereid Fascination

sections.body: Prerequisites: None; Benefit: Members of this race add +1 to their caster level when casting charm person and charm monster.
sections.name: Object of Desire
sections.url: pfsrd://Advanced Race Guide/Rules/Race Builder/Racial Traits/Magical Racial Traits/Standard Traits/Object of Desire

sections.body: Prerequisites: None; Benefit: Members of this race are treated as +1 level higher when casting spells with the fire descriptor, using granted powers of the Fire domain, using bloodline powers of the fire elemental bloodline, using the revelations of the oracle's flame mystery, and determining the damage of alchemist bombs that deal fire damage. This trait does not give members of this race early access to level-based powers; it only affects powers that they could already use without this trait. If a member of this race has a Charisma score of 11 or higher, it also gains the following spell-like abilities: 1/day—dancing lights, flare, prestidigitation, produce flame. The caster level for these spell-like abilities is equal to the user's character level.
sections.name: Pyromaniac
sections.url: pfsrd://Advanced Race Guide/Rules/Race Builder/Racial Traits/Magical Racial Traits/Standard Traits/Pyromaniac

sections.body: Prerequisite: Samsaran subtype; Benefit: Members of this race with a Charisma score of 11 or higher gain the following spell-like abilities: 1/day—comprehend languages, deathwatch, stabilize. The caster level for these effects is equal to the user's character level.
sections.name: Samsaran Magic
sections.url: pfsrd://Advanced Race Guide/Rules/Race Builder/Racial Traits/Magical Racial Traits/Standard Traits/Samsaran Magic

sections.body: Prerequisite: The race has at least a +2 racial bonus to Charisma; Benefit: Members of this race add +1 to the saving throw DCs for their spells and spell-like abilities of the enchantment school. In addition, members of this race with a Wisdom score of 15 or higher may use charm person once per day as a spell-like ability (caster level is equal to the user's character level).
sections.name: Seducer
sections.url: pfsrd://Advanced Race Guide/Rules/Race Builder/Racial Traits/Magical Racial Traits/Standard Traits/Seducer

sections.body: Prerequisites: None; Benefit: Members of this race add +1 to the saving throw DCs for their spells and spell-like abilities of the illusion (shadow) subschool.
sections.name: Shadow Caster
sections.url: pfsrd://Advanced Race Guide/Rules/Race Builder/Racial Traits/Magical Racial Traits/Standard Traits/Shadow Caster

sections.body: Prerequisites: None; Benefit: Members of this race add +1 to the DC of any saving throws against spells of the shadow subschool that they cast. Members of this race with a Charisma score of 11 or higher also gain the following spell-like abilities: 1/day—ghost sound, pass without trace, ventriloquism. The caster level for these spell-like abilities is equal to the user's character level.
sections.name: Shadow Magic
sections.url: pfsrd://Advanced Race Guide/Rules/Race Builder/Racial Traits/Magical Racial Traits/Standard Traits/Shadow Magic

sections.body: Prerequisite: Outsider (native); Benefit: Members of this race gain the use of deathwatch as a constant spell-like ability.
sections.name: Soul Seer
sections.url: pfsrd://Advanced Race Guide/Rules/Race Builder/Racial Traits/Magical Racial Traits/Standard Traits/Soul Seer

sections.body: Prerequisites: None; Benefit: Choose a 2nd-level or lower spell that does not attack a creature or deal damage. Members of this race can use this spell as a spell-like ability once per day. The caster level of the spell is equal to the user's character level. Special: This trait costs as many RP as the level of the spell chosen (minimum 1 RP). This trait can be taken up to three times. Each time you take an additional spell, adjust the RP cost of this trait appropriately.
sections.name: Spell-Like Ability, Lesser
sections.url: pfsrd://Advanced Race Guide/Rules/Race Builder/Racial Traits/Magical Racial Traits/Standard Traits/Spell-Like Ability/Lesser

sections.body: Prerequisites: None; Benefit: Members of this race add +1 to the caster level of any spells with the earth descriptor they cast. Members of this race also gain the following spell-like abilities: constant—nondetection; 1/day—magic stone, stone shape, stone tell. The caster level for these spell-like abilities is equal to the user's character level.
sections.name: Stoneseer
sections.url: pfsrd://Advanced Race Guide/Rules/Race Builder/Racial Traits/Magical Racial Traits/Standard Traits/Stoneseer

sections.body: Prerequisites: None; Benefit: Members of this race are treated as 1 level higher when casting spells with the earth descriptor or using powers of the Earth domain, bloodline powers of the earth elemental bloodline, and revelations of the oracle's stone mystery. This trait does not give members of this race early access to level-based powers; it only affects powers they could already use without this trait.
sections.name: Stonesinger
sections.url: pfsrd://Advanced Race Guide/Rules/Race Builder/Racial Traits/Magical Racial Traits/Standard Traits/Stonesinger

sections.body: Prerequisite: Gnome subtype; Benefit: Members of this race add +1 to the DC of any illusion spells they cast. They also gain the following spell-like abilities: constant—nondetection; 1/day—blindness/deafness, blur, disguise self. The DC for the spells is equal to 10 + the spell's level + the caster's Charisma modifier.
sections.name: Svirfneblin Magic
sections.url: pfsrd://Advanced Race Guide/Rules/Race Builder/Racial Traits/Magical Racial Traits/Standard Traits/Svirfneblin Magic

sections.body: Prerequisite: Outsider (native) with ties to the Plane of Earth or fey type; Benefit: Members of this race gain the following supernatural ability: Once per day, a member of this race can will the earth to rumble and shift, transforming a 10-foot-radius patch of earth, unworked stone, or sand into an area of difficult terrain centered on a square it can touch. This lasts for a number of minutes equal to the user's level, after which the ground returns to normal.
sections.name: Treacherous Earth
sections.url: pfsrd://Advanced Race Guide/Rules/Race Builder/Racial Traits/Magical Racial Traits/Standard Traits/Treacherous Earth

sections.body: Prerequisite: Outsider (native) with ties to the Plane of Air or fey type; Benefit: Members of this race are so in tune with the air and sky they can sense the slightest change in atmospheric conditions. They can spend a full-round action to predict the weather in an area for the next 24 hours. This prediction is always accurate, but cannot account for spells or supernatural effects that might alter the forecast.
sections.name: Weather Savvy
sections.url: pfsrd://Advanced Race Guide/Rules/Race Builder/Racial Traits/Magical Racial Traits/Standard Traits/Weather Savvy

sections.body: Prerequisites: None; Benefit: Choose one of the following spells: detect magic, detect poison, detect secret doors, detect undead. Members of this race can use this spell as a constant spell-like ability. The caster level of the spell-like ability is equal to the user's character level.
sections.name: Constant Spell-Like Divination
sections.url: pfsrd://Advanced Race Guide/Rules/Race Builder/Racial Traits/Magical Racial Traits/Advanced Traits/Constant Spell-Like Divination

sections.body: Prerequisite: Outsider (native) with ties to the Shadow Plane; Benefit: When a member of this race reaches 9th level in any combination of classes, she gains the ability to use shadow walk (self only) as a spell-like ability once per day, and at 13th level, she can use plane shift (self only to the Shadow Plane or the Material Plane only) as a spell-like ability once per day. The caster level of these spell-like abilities is equal to the user's character level.
sections.name: Shadow Travel
sections.url: pfsrd://Advanced Race Guide/Rules/Race Builder/Racial Traits/Magical Racial Traits/Advanced Traits/Shadow Travel

sections.body: Prerequisites: None; Benefit: Choose a 3rd-level or 4th-level spell that does not attack a creature or deal damage. Members of this race can use this spell as a spell-like ability once per day. The caster level of the spell is equal to the user's character level. Special: This trait costs as many RP as the level of the spell chosen. This trait can be taken up to three times. Each time you take an additional spell, adjust the RP cost of this trait appropriately.
sections.name: Spell-Like Ability, Greater
sections.url: pfsrd://Advanced Race Guide/Rules/Race Builder/Racial Traits/Magical Racial Traits/Advanced Traits/Spell-Like Ability/Greater

sections.body: Prerequisites: None; Benefit: Choose a 3rd-level or lower spell that does not attack a creature or deal damage. Members of this race can use this spell as an at-will spell-like ability. The caster level of the spell is equal to the user's character level. Special: This trait costs as many RP as twice the level of spell chosen (minimum 2). Up to five spells can be chosen when you take this trait. Each time you take an additional spell, adjust the RP cost of this trait appropriately.
sections.name: Spell-Like Ability, At-Will
sections.url: pfsrd://Advanced Race Guide/Rules/Race Builder/Racial Traits/Magical Racial Traits/Monstrous Traits/Spell-Like Ability/At-Will

sections.name: Magical Racial Traits

sections.body: The following racial traits augment a race's ability to move about the world.
Prerequisites: None; Benefit: Members of this race have a climb speed of 20 feet, and gain the +8 racial bonus on Climb checks that a climb speed normally grants.
sections.name: Climb
sections.url: pfsrd://Advanced Race Guide/Rules/Race Builder/Racial Traits/Movement Racial Traits/Standard Traits/Climb

sections.body: Prerequisite: Native to the Darklands; Benefit: Members of this race can move unhindered through difficult terrain while underground. In addition, members of this race with a Dexterity score of 13 or higher gain Nimble Moves as a bonus feat.
sections.name: Darklands Stalker
sections.url: pfsrd://Advanced Race Guide/Rules/Race Builder/Racial Traits/Movement Racial Traits/Standard Traits/Darklands Stalker

sections.body: Prerequisite: The race has at least a +2 racial bonus to Dexterity; Benefit: Members of this race receive Run as a bonus feat and a +2 racial bonus on initiative checks.
sections.name: Fleet-Footed
sections.url: pfsrd://Advanced Race Guide/Rules/Race Builder/Racial Traits/Movement Racial Traits/Standard Traits/Fleet-Footed

sections.body: Prerequisites: None; Benefit: Members of this race take no damage from falling (as if subject to a constant nonmagical feather fall spell). While in midair, members of this race can move up to 5 feet in any horizontal direction for every 1 foot they fall, at a speed of 60 feet per round. A member of a race with gliding wings cannot gain height with these wings alone; it merely coasts in other directions as it falls. If subjected to a strong wind or any other effect that causes a creature with gliding wings to rise, it can take advantage of the updraft to increase the distance it can glide.
sections.name: Gliding Wings
sections.url: pfsrd://Advanced Race Guide/Rules/Race Builder/Racial Traits/Movement Racial Traits/Standard Traits/Gliding Wings

sections.body: Prerequisite: The race has at least a +2 racial bonus to Dexterity; Benefit: Members of this race are always considered to have a running start when making Acrobatics checks to jump.
sections.name: Jumper
sections.url: pfsrd://Advanced Race Guide/Rules/Race Builder/Racial Traits/Movement Racial Traits/Standard Traits/Jumper

sections.body: Prerequisites: None; Benefit: Members of this race are immune to altitude sickness and do not lose their Dexterity bonus to AC when making Climb checks or Acrobatics checks to cross narrow or slippery surfaces.
sections.name: Mountaineer
sections.url: pfsrd://Advanced Race Guide/Rules/Race Builder/Racial Traits/Movement Racial Traits/Standard Traits/Mountaineer

sections.body: Prerequisite: Normal speed; Benefit: Members of this race gain a +10 foot racial bonus to their speed when using the charge, run, or withdraw actions.
sections.name: Sprinter
sections.url: pfsrd://Advanced Race Guide/Rules/Race Builder/Racial Traits/Movement Racial Traits/Standard Traits/Sprinter

sections.body: Prerequisite: The race has at least a +2 racial bonus to Dexterity; Benefit: Members of this race reduce the penalty for using Stealth while moving at full speed by 5, and reduce the Stealth check penalty for sniping by 10.
sections.name: Swift as Shadows
sections.url: pfsrd://Advanced Race Guide/Rules/Race Builder/Racial Traits/Movement Racial Traits/Standard Traits/Swift as Shadows

sections.body: Prerequisites: None; Benefit: Members of this race have a swim speed of 30 feet and gain the +8 racial bonus on Swim checks that a swim speed normally grants.
sections.name: Swim
sections.url: pfsrd://Advanced Race Guide/Rules/Race Builder/Racial Traits/Movement Racial Traits/Standard Traits/Swim

sections.body: Prerequisite: Normal speed; Benefit: Choose a ranger favored terrain type. Members of this race can move through natural difficult terrain at their normal speed while within the chosen terrain. Magically altered terrain affects them normally.
sections.name: Terrain Stride
sections.url: pfsrd://Advanced Race Guide/Rules/Race Builder/Racial Traits/Movement Racial Traits/Standard Traits/Terrain Stride

sections.body: Prerequisites: None; Benefit: Members of this race have wings that do not provide the lift required for actual flight, but do have enough power to aid flight attained by some other method, and grant a +4 racial bonus on Fly checks.
sections.name: Vestigial Wings
sections.url: pfsrd://Advanced Race Guide/Rules/Race Builder/Racial Traits/Movement Racial Traits/Standard Traits/Vestigial Wings

sections.body: Prerequisite: Normal speed; Benefit: Members of this race gain a burrow speed of 20 feet. Special: This trait can be taken twice. The second time it is taken, the burrow speed increases to 30 feet.
sections.name: Burrow
sections.url: pfsrd://Advanced Race Guide/Rules/Race Builder/Racial Traits/Movement Racial Traits/Advanced Traits/Burrow

sections.body: Prerequisite: Normal speed; Benefit: Members of this race gain a +10 foot bonus to their base speed. Special: This trait can be taken more than once, but each time it is, the cost increases by 1 RP. Its effects stack.
sections.name: Fast
sections.url: pfsrd://Advanced Race Guide/Rules/Race Builder/Racial Traits/Movement Racial Traits/Advanced Traits/Fast

sections.body: Prerequisites: None; Benefit: Members of this race have a fly speed of 30 feet with clumsy maneuverability. Special: This trait can be taken more than once. For each additional 2 RP spent, the race's fly speed increases by +10 feet, and the maneuverability improves by one step.
sections.name: Flight
sections.url: pfsrd://Advanced Race Guide/Rules/Race Builder/Racial Traits/Movement Racial Traits/Advanced Traits/Flight

sections.body: Prerequisite: Swim racial trait; Benefit: Members of this race receive a +10 foot bonus to their swim speed. Special: This trait can be taken twice. Its effects stack.
sections.name: Powerful Swimmer
sections.url: pfsrd://Advanced Race Guide/Rules/Race Builder/Racial Traits/Movement Racial Traits/Advanced Traits/Powerful Swimmer

sections.body: Prerequisite: Climb racial trait; Benefit: Members of this race can cling to cave walls and even ceilings as long as the surface has hand- and footholds. In effect, members of this race are treated as being constantly under the effects of a nonmagical spider climb spell, save that members of this race cannot cling to smooth surfaces. This trait doubles the normal +8 racial bonus on Climb checks normally granted to creatures with a climb speed (to a total +16 bonus).
sections.name: Expert Climber
sections.url: pfsrd://Advanced Race Guide/Rules/Race Builder/Racial Traits/Movement Racial Traits/Monstrous Traits/Expert Climber

sections.name: Movement Racial Traits

sections.body: The following racial traits augment a race's fighting prowess.

Prerequisites: Small or larger size; Benefit: Members of this race gain a natural bite attack, dealing damage equivalent to that of a creature two size categories lower than normal for their size (1d2 for Small races, 1d3 for Medium, etc.). The bite is a primary attack, or a secondary attack if the creature is wielding manufactured weapons. Special: This trait can be taken up to two times. The second time it is taken, the bite damage increases by one size category.
sections.name: Bite
sections.url: pfsrd://Advanced Race Guide/Rules/Race Builder/Racial Traits/Offense Racial Traits/Standard Traits/Bite

sections.body:
Prerequisites: Aberration, construct, dragon, humanoid (reptilian), monstrous humanoid, or outsider (native) with ties to an elemental plane; Benefit: Choose one of the following energy types: acid, cold, electricity, or fire. If the creature is an outsider (native), it must have ties to an elemental plane, and it must pick an energy that corresponds to the plane it has ties to (acid [earth], cold [water], electricity [air], or fire [fire]). Then pick either a 15-foot cone or a 20-foot line. Once per day, as a standard action, members of this race can make a supernatural breath weapon attack that deals 1d6 points of the damage type chosen in the area chosen. All creatures within the affected area must make a Reflex saving throw to avoid taking damage. The save DC against this breath weapon is 10 + 1/2 the user's character level + the user's Constitution modifier. Those who succeed at the save take no damage from the attack. Special: You can take this trait more than once. Each time you do so, the cost of this trait increases by 1 RP. When do, you can augment the breath weapon in the following ways (augmentations marked with an asterisk [*] can be taken more than once).

Extra Breath*: The member of this race can use its breath weapon an additional time per day.

Increased Area: Increase the cone's size to 30 feet or the line to 50 feet.

Increased Damage*: Increase the damage by an additional d6.

Powerful Breath: The breath weapon deals half damage on a failed saving throw.
sections.name: Breath Weapon
sections.url: pfsrd://Advanced Race Guide/Rules/Race Builder/Racial Traits/Offense Racial Traits/Standard Traits/Breath Weapon

sections.body: Prerequisite: Outsider (native) with ties to Elysium, Heaven, or Nirvana; Benefit: Members of this race gain a +1 insight bonus on attack rolls and to AC against evil outsiders and a +2 racial bonus to identify evil outsiders or items or effects evil outsiders create with Knowledge (planes) or Spellcraft; they may use these skills untrained for this purpose.
sections.name: Celestial Crusader
sections.url: pfsrd://Advanced Race Guide/Rules/Race Builder/Racial Traits/Offense Racial Traits/Standard Traits/Celestial Crusader

sections.body: Prerequisite: Dragon type or outsider (native) with ties to an elemental plane; Benefit: Pick one of the following energy types that corresponds to the plane the race has ties to: acid (earth), cold (water), electricity (air), or fire (fire). Members of this race gain the following supernatural ability: Once per day as a swift action, a member of this race can call on the elemental power lurking in its veins to shroud its arms in the energy type that corresponds to the elemental plane its race has ties to. Unarmed strikes with its elbows or hands (or attacks with weapons held in those hands) deal +1d6 points of damage of the appropriate energy type. This lasts for 1 round per character level. The creature may end the effects of its elemental assault early as a free action.
sections.name: Elemental Assault
sections.url: pfsrd://Advanced Race Guide/Rules/Race Builder/Racial Traits/Offense Racial Traits/Standard Traits/Elemental Assault

sections.body: Prerequisites: None; Benefit: Members of this race gain the following extraordinary ability: If the hit points of a member of this race fall below 0 but it is not yet dead, it can continue to fight. If it does, it is staggered, and loses 1 hit point each round. It still dies when its hit points reach a negative amount equal to its Constitution score.
sections.name: Ferocity
sections.url: pfsrd://Advanced Race Guide/Rules/Race Builder/Racial Traits/Offense Racial Traits/Standard Traits/Ferocity

sections.body: Prerequisites: None; Benefit: Members of this race gain a +2 racial bonus on Strength checks to break objects and a +2 racial bonus on combat maneuver checks to sunder.
sections.name: Gatecrasher
sections.url: pfsrd://Advanced Race Guide/Rules/Race Builder/Racial Traits/Offense Racial Traits/Standard Traits/Gatecrasher

sections.body: Prerequisites: None; Benefit: Choose two subtypes of humanoids or outsiders or one creature type other than humanoid or outsider. Members of this race gain a +1 racial bonus on attack rolls against creatures of these subtypes or this type.
sections.name: Hatred
sections.url: pfsrd://Advanced Race Guide/Rules/Race Builder/Racial Traits/Offense Racial Traits/Standard Traits/Hatred

sections.body: Prerequisite: Small; Benefit: Members of this race gain a +4 racial bonus on combat maneuver checks to trip an opponent.
sections.name: Kneecapper
sections.url: pfsrd://Advanced Race Guide/Rules/Race Builder/Racial Traits/Offense Racial Traits/Standard Traits/Kneecapper

sections.body: Prerequisites: None; Benefit: Members of this race gain a +2 racial bonus on Spellcraft checks made to identify a spell being cast and a +1 racial bonus on attack rolls against arcane spellcasters. Members of this race only gain this bonus against creatures that use spells, not against those that only use spell-like abilities.
sections.name: Magehunter
sections.url: pfsrd://Advanced Race Guide/Rules/Race Builder/Racial Traits/Offense Racial Traits/Standard Traits/Magehunter

sections.body: Prerequisite: Orc subtype; Benefit: Once per day, when a member of this race is reduced to fewer than 0 hit points but is not killed, it can fight on for 1 more round as if disabled. At the end of its next turn, unless brought to above 0 hit points, it immediately falls unconscious and begins to die.
sections.name: Orc Ferocity
sections.url: pfsrd://Advanced Race Guide/Rules/Race Builder/Racial Traits/Offense Racial Traits/Standard Traits/Orc Ferocity

sections.body: Prerequisites: None; Benefit: Members of this race are skilled with poison and never risk accidentally poisoning themselves when applying it to weapons.
sections.name: Poison Use
sections.url: pfsrd://Advanced Race Guide/Rules/Race Builder/Racial Traits/Offense Racial Traits/Standard Traits/Poison Use

sections.body: Prerequisites: None; Benefit: Members of this race gain a +2 bonus on combat maneuver checks made to bull rush or overrun an opponent. This bonus only applies while both the member of this race and its opponent are standing on the ground.
sections.name: Relentless
sections.url: pfsrd://Advanced Race Guide/Rules/Race Builder/Racial Traits/Offense Racial Traits/Standard Traits/Relentless

sections.body: Prerequisites: None; Benefit: Members of this race gain a +1 racial bonus on attack rolls, a +2 dodge bonus to AC, and a +2 bonus on Perception checks against flying creatures. In addition, enemies on higher ground gain no attack roll bonus against members of this race.
sections.name: Sky Sentinel
sections.url: pfsrd://Advanced Race Guide/Rules/Race Builder/Racial Traits/Offense Racial Traits/Standard Traits/Sky Sentinel

sections.body: Prerequisites: None; Benefit: Members of this race have a tail they can use to make attacks of opportunity with a reach of 5 feet. The tail is a natural attack that deals 1d6 points of damage plus the user's Strength modifier if Small, 1d8 points of damage plus the user's Strength modifier if Medium, or 1d10 points of damage plus 1-1/2 times the user's Strength modifier if Large. Special: If a Large creature has the reach trait, its tail also gains reach.
sections.name: Slapping Tail
sections.url: pfsrd://Advanced Race Guide/Rules/Race Builder/Racial Traits/Offense Racial Traits/Standard Traits/Slapping Tail

sections.body: Prerequisite: Monstrous humanoid type, reptilian subtype, or undead type; Benefit: Members of this race secrete a terrible scent as a 15-foot aura that nearly every other creature finds offensive. All living creatures (except those with the stench aura ability) within the aura must succeed at a Fortitude saving throw (DC 10 + 1/2 the user's character level + the user's Constitution modifier) or be sickened for 5 rounds. Creatures that succeed at the saving throw cannot be sickened by the same creature's stench aura for 24 hours. A delay poison or neutralize poison spell or similar effect removes the effect from the sickened creature. This is a poison effect. Special: This trait can be taken up to two times. The second time it is taken, the size of the aura increases to 30 feet, and the duration of the effect increases to 10 rounds.
sections.name: Stench Aura
sections.url: pfsrd://Advanced Race Guide/Rules/Race Builder/Racial Traits/Offense Racial Traits/Standard Traits/Stench Aura

sections.body: Prerequisite: Medium or larger size; Benefit: Members of this race can make melee attacks with their long, sticky tongues. This is a secondary attack. A creature hit by this attack cannot move more than 10 feet away from the attacker and takes a –2 penalty to AC as long as the tongue is attached (this penalty does not stack if multiple tongues are attached). The tongue can be removed by the target or an adjacent ally by making an opposed Strength check against the attacking creature as a standard action or by dealing 2 points of damage to the tongue (AC 11, damage does not reduce the sticky-tongued creature's hit points). A member of this race cannot move more than 10 feet away from a creature stuck to its tongue, but it can release its tongue from the target as a free action. A member of this race can only have one creature attached to its tongue at a time. Special: This trait can be taken up to two times. The second time it is taken, members of this race gain the ability to pull a creature attached to their tongue 5 feet toward them as a swift action.
sections.name: Sticky Tongue
sections.url: pfsrd://Advanced Race Guide/Rules/Race Builder/Racial Traits/Offense Racial Traits/Standard Traits/Sticky Tongue

sections.body: Prerequisite: Medium or smaller size; Benefit: Members of this race are used to living and fighting communally with other members of their race. Up to two members of this race can share the same square at the same time. If two members of this race that are occupying the same square attack the same foe, they are considered to be flanking that foe as if they were in two opposite squares. Special: If the race is Small or smaller, this trait costs 1 RP. If the race is Medium, it costs 2 RP.
sections.name: Swarming
sections.url: pfsrd://Advanced Race Guide/Rules/Race Builder/Racial Traits/Offense Racial Traits/Standard Traits/Swarming

sections.body: Prerequisites: None; Benefit: Members of this race gain the following supernatural ability: Once per hour as a standard action, a member of this race can emit a thunderous croak. Any creature not of its subtype (if humanoid) or type (if another race type) must make a successful Will saving throw (DC 10 + 1/2 the user's character level + the user's Charisma modifier) or become shaken for 1d4 rounds. A target that successfully saves cannot be affected by the user's terrifying croak for 24 hours. Creatures that are already shaken become frightened for 1d4 rounds instead. This is a sonic, mind-affecting effect.
sections.name: Terrifying Croak
sections.url: pfsrd://Advanced Race Guide/Rules/Race Builder/Racial Traits/Offense Racial Traits/Standard Traits/Terrifying Croak

sections.body:
